title: Short Term Lease, Elevator, Microwave
posting_body: Once Ohio's largest high school, now one of Cleveland's most innovative apartment communities, The Brick Lofts at Historic West Tech High is a must see.
It is a beautiful building with exceptional architecture and construction qualities, unique loft-style apartment floor plans, and superior amenities.
Come experience the new stylish, and sophisticated look of the former West Tech High School.
Beautifully planned suites with a variety of 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment floor plans are available for you to call home.
You will find yourself living a lifestyle that fits your needs.

Constructed in 1912, the $32 million conversion of the West Tech High School into the West Tech Lofts in 2003- 2004, preserved the architecture, charm and character of the school; even the lockers adorn the corridors.
Superior and modern amenities in both the common areas and the private residences, compliment this one of a kind renovation.

Outstanding community amenities include garage parking, an exceptional fitness center, spacious game room, laundry center, and a community room created from the original high school auditorium, and off-street or garage parking.

Just seconds from the I-90 freeway and just minutes from Downtown Cleveland, Lakewood, Ohio City and Tremont; The Brick Lofts at Historic West Tech High are centrally located in the heart of one of Cleveland's historic neighborhoods.
Let your home reflect your passion for design with a story.
See yourself in our Cudell Cleveland apartments.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
